conbody.p: Text and Notes widgets let you attach comments and descriptions to other widgets in the active pageflow diagram to give other users a better understanding of the diagram. The Text widget is a standalone item in the diagram. The Note widget, however, can be either standalone or attached to another widget in the diagram.

A pageflow can have many texts and notes. There is no limit to the amount of characters that you can enter as text or note, although a short description is always recommended. Information entered as text and notes do not contribute to the final code or documentation generation.
